title: Strengthening Scientific Research Capabilities through Library Information Literacy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer and internet usage skills
context.additional_context: Education for general citizens in science fields, emphasizing research methods utilizing library information resources

learning_goals: Learners can locate and utilize reliable information sources in the field of science from the library
Learners can explain effective methods for searching library databases and digital resources
Learners can present a step-by-step process for planning a science research project using library information

resources: Digital Archive Access Permissions for Libraries

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
